item.name: Arctext
item.description: Curving Text with CSS3 and jQuery

item.name: aSlyder
item.description: Highly versitile slideshow engine (by the creator of JAM)

item.name: Avgrund Modal
item.description: Modal pop ups

item.name: Countdown
item.description: A simple JavaScript API for producing an accurate, intuitive description of the timespan between two Date instances.

item.name: FitText
item.description: Use this plugin on your fluid or responsive layout to achieve scalable headlines that fill the width of a parent element.

item.name: Gridster
item.description: Build intuitive draggable layouts from elements spanning multiple columns

item.name: iCheck
item.description: Add custom styling to radio buttons and check boxes, even in IE6

item.name: jQuery Countdown
item.description: A jQuery plugin that sets a div or span to show a countdown to a given time.

item.name: jQuery Knob
item.description: Creates interactive dials

item.name: Lettering
item.description: jQuery plugin for radical web typography

item.name: Tubular
item.description: Display a Youtube video as webpage background

item.name: Typeahead
item.description: Autocomplete plugin by Twitter

item.name: jQuery
item.description: The jQuery core. Includes jQuery Migrate.

item.name: jQuery Schedule
item.description: Query Schedule provides scheduled/deferred actions on DOM elements

item.name: jQuery Suggest
item.description: A simple inline autosuggest jQuery plugin

item.name: jQuery Hotkeys
item.description: jQuery Hotkeys lets you watch for keyboard events anywhere in your code supporting almost any key combination.

item.name: jQuery Form
item.description: Allows you to easily and unobtrusively upgrade HTML forms to use AJAX.

item.name: jQuery Color
item.description: jQuery plugin for color manipulation and animation support.

item.name: jQuery Masonry
item.description: Masonry is a JavaScript grid layout library.

item.name: Iris
item.description: A(n awesome) Color Picker

item.name: ThickBox
item.description: ThickBox powers the modal lightboxes used in the WordPress admin, including the post editor's "Media" button (prior to Wordpress 3.5 only) and the "Details" links on the Plugin "Search Results" screen.

item.name: Jcrop
item.description: Jcrop is the quick and easy way to add image cropping functionality to your web application.

item.name: MediaElement
item.description: HTML5 video and audio made easy. One file. Any browser. Same UI. (Included with WP 3.6+ only)

item.name: jQuery UI Core
item.description: jQuery UI is a curated set of user interface interactions, effects, widgets, and themes built on top of the jQuery JavaScript Library.

item.name: jQuery UI Widget
item.description: Create stateful jQuery plugins using the same abstraction as all jQuery UI widgets.

item.name: jQuery UI Mouse
item.description: Similar to jQuery.Widget, the mouse interaction is not intended to be used directly. It is purely a base layer for other widgets to inherit from.

item.name: jQuery UI Accordion
item.description: Displays collapsible content panels for presenting information in a limited amount of space.

item.name: jQuery UI Autocomplete
item.description: Enables users to quickly find and select from a pre-populated list of values as they type, leveraging searching and filtering.

item.name: jQuery UI Slider
item.description: Drag a handle to select a numeric value.

item.name: jQuery UI Tabs
item.description: A single content area with multiple panels, each associated with a header in a list.

item.name: jQuery UI Sortable
item.description: Reorder elements in a list or grid using the mouse.

item.name: jQuery UI Draggable
item.description: Allow elements to be moved using the mouse.

item.name: jQuery UI Droppable
item.description: Create targets for draggable elements.

item.name: jQuery UI Selectable
item.description: Use the mouse to select elements, individually or in a group.

item.name: jQuery UI Position
item.description: Position an element relative to the window, document, another element, or the cursor/mouse.

item.name: jQuery UI Datepicker
item.description: Select a date from a popup or inline calendar.

item.name: jQuery UI Resizable
item.description: Change the size of an element using the mouse.

item.name: jQuery UI Dialog
item.description: Open content in an interactive overlay.

item.name: jQuery UI Button
item.description: Enhances standard form elements like buttons, inputs and anchors to themeable buttons with appropriate hover and active styles.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects
item.description: Functionality provided by jquery.ui.effect.js.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Blind
item.description: The blind effect hides or shows an element by wrapping the element in a container, and "pulling the blinds"

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Bounce
item.description: The bounce effect bounces an element. When used with hide or show, the last or first bounce will also fade in/out.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Clip
item.description: The clip effect will hide or show an element by clipping the element vertically or horizontally.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Drop
item.description: The drop effect hides or shows an element fading in/out and sliding in a direction.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Explode
item.description: The explode effect hides or shows an element by splitting it into pieces.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Fade
item.description: The fade effect hides or shows an element by fading it.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Fold
item.description: The fold effect hides or shows an element by folding it.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Highlight
item.description: The highlight effect hides or shows an element by animating its background color first.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Pulsate
item.description: The pulsate effect hides or shows an element by pulsing it in or out.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Scale
item.description: Shrink or grow an element by a percentage factor.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Shake
item.description: Shakes the element multiple times, vertically or horizontally.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Slide
item.description: Slides the element out of the viewport.

item.name: jQuery UI Effects - Transfer
item.description: Transfers the outline of an element to another element.

item.name: Backbone JS
item.description: Gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.

item.name: Underscore JS
item.description: a utility-belt library for JavaScript that provides a lot of the functional programming support that you would expect in Prototype.js (or Ruby), but without extending any of the built-in JavaScript objects. It's the tie to go along with jQuery's tux, and Backbone.js's suspenders.

item.name: Simple AJAX Code-kit
item.description: A simple set of code to allow you to put AJAX into your webpages with none of the fuss or overhead of other packages.
